metadata.feature_description: Analytics for wiki content including page edits, contributors, and content growth

steps.action: Navigate to PersonaBar > Dashboard > Community Analytics
steps.expected: Community Analytics panel should open with multiple content type tabs
steps.actual: Community Analytics panel opened showing tabs for Answers, Blogs, Discussions, Events, Ideas, and Wiki

steps.action: Click on Wiki tab to view wiki-specific analytics
steps.expected: Wiki analytics should display with Community Health metrics, Engagement, Creates & Views sections
steps.actual: Wiki tab displayed showing wiki-specific metrics including: Articles older than 24 hours with no Views (0%), Articles older than 12 hours with Views but no Interaction (0%), Articles older than 24 hours deleted (0%)

steps.action: Scroll down to view Engagement and Creates & Views sections
steps.expected: Engagement chart and Creates & Views metrics should be visible
steps.actual: Engagement section displayed with Interacted, Formed Relationship, and Shared metrics. Creates & Views section showed CREATES and VIEWS counters with timeline chart

steps.action: View Trending Tags and Popular Content sections
steps.expected: Trending Tags and Popular Content sections should be visible
steps.actual: Both sections visible - showed 'No trending tags available in selected period' and 'No popular content available in selected period' for the week view (expected when no data exists)

steps.action: Change Comparative Term dropdown from '1 w' to '1 m' (1 month)
steps.expected: The comparative term should change to 1 month
steps.actual: Comparative term dropdown successfully changed to '1 m' (1 month)

steps.action: Click on date range picker and view available options
steps.expected: Date picker should show Day, Week, Month, Year, and Custom options
steps.actual: Date picker displayed with all expected options: Day, Week, Month, Year, Custom

steps.expected: Date range should update to show a 1-month period and data should refresh
steps.actual: Date range updated to '28 Jan 2026 - 27 Feb 2026'. Wiki analytics now showing actual data: Articles older than 24 hours with no Views: 100%, Engagement chart showing activity spike around Feb 9

steps.action: View Engagement metrics in Month view
steps.expected: Engagement metrics should display contributor activity data
steps.actual: Engagement section showed: Engagement 100%, Interacted: 0, Formed Relationship: 9, Shared: 0. Timeline chart displayed activity from JAN 28 to FEB 27 with visible spike around FEB 9

steps.action: View Trending Tags and Popular Content sections with Month data
steps.expected: Trending Tags should show popular tags and Popular Content should show top wiki articles
steps.actual: Trending Tags displayed: test (12), social (4), group-wiki (4). Popular Content showed actual wiki articles: 'Group Wiki Test Article' (100%), 'Test Article for Metadata' (100%), 'Test Article for Revision...' (100%) - all from Wiki: February 09, 2026

test_scenarios.scenario_name: Track edit frequency via Creates & Views

steps.action: View Creates & Views metrics in Month view
steps.expected: Creates and Views counters should display wiki content creation and view statistics
steps.actual: Creates & Views section showed CREATES: 7, VIEWS: 1. Timeline chart displayed content creation activity over the month period with spike around FEB 9 indicating article creation activity

steps.action: Click Export button in Wiki analytics section
steps.expected: Wiki analytics data should be exported to a file
steps.actual: Export functionality triggered successfully. File 'Wiki.xlsx' was downloaded to the .playwright-mcp folder

observations: The Wiki Module Analytics feature is part of the Community Analytics dashboard and shares UI patterns with other content type analytics (Answers, Blogs, Discussions, Events, Ideas)
Wiki-specific Community Health metrics track: Articles older than 24 hours with no Views, Articles older than 12 hours with Views but no Interaction, Articles older than 24 hours deleted
The Comparative Term dropdown offers 1 year, 1 month, and 1 week options for comparison periods
Date range picker offers Day, Week, Month, Year, and Custom time period selections
The export feature generates an Excel file (Wiki.xlsx) containing the analytics data
Pagination controls (Prev/Next) are available for both Trending Tags and Popular Content sections when data exceeds display limits
